item.title: Golang自定义json解析类型的实现
item.description: 1.json解析到Struct类型 package main import ( "encoding/json" "fmt" ) type Book struct { BookName string `json:"bookname"` AuthorName string `json:"authorname"` AuthorAge string `json:"authorage"` } func main() { jsonbuf := ` { "bookname":"booker", "authorname": "Tom", "authorage": "28" }` var book Book err := json.
